title: Forfeit Completes Missions
body: The Skill mission for the 2017 Worlds missions requires that you complete a game before 25 minutes (or something like that). I just got into a game where the other team had 2 AFK, so they forfeited early. Once I got out of the game, the mission complete its-self! I guess that counted as an actual victory as far as the missions are concerned.

replies.body:
Ayyyyyy looks like someone might have found an easy way to get things done xD! 

I'm not 100% sure if the mission is designed to complete that way, but heck, good job getting it done supa fast and easy!
